articles.title: Liver Diseases May Cause Abnormalities in Your Heart: What New Study Says - The Quint FIT
articles.description: Liver diseases, even in early stages, can impact your heart health, found a new study published in the Frontiers in Cardiovascular Medicine journal by researchers at the Smidt Heart Institute at Cedars-Sinai.
articles.content:
The big reveal: The researchers found that increased FIB-4 scores in a person, which indicate liver fibrosis or severe liver disease, are also associated with heart abnormalities.
